---
title: "View documentation activity"
date: last-modified
---

Use the audit trail functionality in the {{< var vm_platform >}} to track or audit all the information events associated with a specific model.

## Prerequisites

This topic matters for model developers, model validators, and auditors.

* The model you are documenting is registered in the model inventory
* Model documentation has already been created for this project
* A model developer has started generating documentation, either using the {{< var vm_dev >}} or via the online UI editor

## Steps

1. Login to the {{< var vm_login >}}.

2. In the left sidebar, click [**Model Inventory**]({{< var vm_url >}}/model-inventory).
